title: A Game of Deception
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, hey! Ai wants to appear on “The Fallen Angel Yohane’s Demonic Gathering” again~! When will you do the next one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Heh.... There’s no need to rush, little demon. The next one will be held on the night of the new moon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai trained a lot with Rinari and Miachi, you know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh, for what game?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s the one where you have to do tasks without knowing who’s good and who’s bad. The bad guys mess with the good guys’ tasks and try to kill them in secret, and everyone else has to guess who the bad guys are. What’s the name again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Aaah, that game. I think you want at least 5 players for that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai has already asked Rinari, Miachi, and Rin~ They’re all good to go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... Yohane commends you, little demon. You did well to have prepared everything for me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yaaay! So, Ai wants to wear this outfit for the stream~, let’s all wear the same one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeeeh!! What with this outfit!? It’s so cool and lovely!! Can Yohane really wear this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
